page.title: 06A Day in Mike Mills Life
page.content: At 5.45,Mike Mills who is the warden of the Ennerdale Field Centre gets up and stokes the boiler.He has his breakfast at about 7.00,and lets out the ducks and hens after breakfast. He takes his two children to meet the taxi at 8.10.His children go to Ennerdale school,where only 12 people go.Then he comes back to the centre and does all kinds of chores around the centre,like collecting night lights and cleaning the dormatories. He then does office work like seeing how much money he owes and funds for the centre. He has to keep checking that his 7 sheep are there. His office work takes up most of the day.His children finish school at 3.15.And he goes to meet the taxi and takes his children home.
